description:
Description


This multi-balm with 13 shades offers vibrant pigmentation and a dewy glow for a radiant complexion.
The melting balm texture smoothly melts upon application, creating a transparent and shimmering dew coating.
Infused with Dewy Glow Vegan Complex such as Cacao Seed Butter to moisturize dry lips deeply.
 
How To Use

1. Apply an appropriate amount to the lips using your fingers or a dewy ball lip brush.

2. Layer it according to your preference to adjust the glow gel.

3. Tap the remaining product onto your cheeks to add a touch of color.
 
Key Ingredients

Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Microcrystalline Wax, Synthetic Wax, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Menthol, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Titanium Dioxide, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Squalane, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tin Oxide, Water, Tocopherol, BHT, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate

description:
Description


The Oddtype New Rules Blur Balm is a revolutionary, multi-use balm that combines a weightless, velvety finish with vibrant color.
Available in 5 bold and trendy shades, this blur balm is perfect for creating a soft-focus, blurred effect on lips, cheeks, or eyes.
Its smooth, creamy texture blends seamlessly onto the skin, leaving behind a natural, matte finish without any dryness or patchiness.

The Blur Balm is highly versatile, allowing you to easily build color intensity or keep it subtle for a more natural look.
With its lightweight, pocket-friendly design, it’s ideal for quick touch-ups on the go, giving your makeup routine a modern, effortless vibe.
This product is a must-have for achieving that trendy, blurred, soft-focus effect on the face.

It is applied comfortably and lightly, providing a pleasant finish.
The sliding film film adheres to the lips and provides excellent color persistence.
It is composed of a soft, cozy color that suits well.
 
How To Use

For lips: Apply the blur balm directly to the lips and blend with your fingertips for a soft, diffused look. Add more layers to build intensity.
For cheeks: Dab a small amount of balm onto your cheeks and blend gently with your fingers or a brush for a natural flush.
For eyes: Apply a small amount to your eyelids and blend to create a soft, matte wash of color.
Reapply as needed for touch-ups throughout the day to maintain the soft-blur effect.
 
Key Ingredients


Methyl trimethicone, trimethyl siloxy silicate, synthetic wax, polypropyl silsesquioxane, silica, candelilla wax, isohexadecane, titanium dioxide, microcrystalline wax, jojoba seed oil, mica, yellow iron oxide, cetea. Reyl alcohol, red iron oxide, triethoxycaprylyl silane, black iron oxide, hydrogenated rapeseed oil, hydrogenated palm oil, sorbitan isostearate, red No. 104 (1), 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl glycol, ethylhexylglycerin, etc

description:
Description


Inspired by Andersen’s The Snow Queen, Dinto provides cold and refreshing glow like snow on your lips.
The sanitary silver metal applicator provides a freezing effect on lips, and the fingertip-shaped design allows delicate application by anyone.
Non-sticky plumping icy jelly formula covers lips with coldness to give volumizing and refreshing glow.
The glow texture consists of high molecular polymer reflects light in different angles and creates a clear protective coating layer for long-lasting lip glow.

 
How To Use

1. Squeeze adequate amount and gently apply from the lower lip.
2. Apply the product on the upper lip without smacking.
 
Key Ingredients

Contains low irritating cooling plumping ingredient and lip care ingredient to provide both makeup and lip moisturizing effects.
Contains Iceland glacial milk to help with skin moisturizing and soothing.
Contains Saussurea spp Extract to help with skin moisturizing and vitality.
The high glowing and moisturizing paste and oil base form a moisture holding film to inhibit moisture loss, while at the same time supplying oil complex between lips to do lip care.

description:
Description

he go-to lip plumper to volumized your lips!

Acheive a juicy pouty lip with our new Lip plumpers! Maxi and Light

 

Maxi - For those ready for stronger sensation and noticeably fuller lips

Light - For beginners looking for a mild tingle and suvtle volums

 

Texture: Light, non-sticky texture with volume and gloss

Colour:

Maxi - Clear Light Pink,

Light - Clear colored

 

MAXI

1. Needle Free, plumping lip effect

The volume maximizing lip plumper enables a dramatically plumped up, long lasting lip volume.

2. 3X plumping effect compared to Light. Includes Moisturizing ingredients

EWG Grade 1 ingredient (Vanillyl Butyl Ether) and Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract offers safe plumping effect. Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernal Oil and Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil to keep your lips moisturised and vibrant

3. Non- Sticky, Volumised Shine

The plumper instantly fills the lips with a non- sticky, long- lasting shine, maximizing the full lip look.

 

 

LIGHT

1. A mild plumping effect that improves lip volume after 2 weeks of use

A daily lip plumper that gives the lips a charming pout after 2 weeks of continuous use.

2. Safe plumping ingredients and moisturizing effects

EWG Grade 1 ingredient (Vanillyl Butyl Ether) and Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract offers safe and stable plumping effect. Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) seed oil and Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil keeps your lips smooth and moisturised.

3. Non- Stocky, Volumised Shine

Clear, dewy shine last for long hours without stickiness and help creates a beautiful, subtle volume!

description:
Description


Hydrate, plump and shine-on!
Our Juicy Glass Lip Oils are inspired by fruits and are non-sticky, hydrating and help plump the look of lips.

These high-shine glass lip oils come in a five super sheer shades and three milky pigmented shades and are formulated with skin-loving and fruit-infused ingredients that nourish lips. 
Our ultra comfortable large applicator makes it easy to give your lips glassy shine in just one swipe!
Each individual lip oil has a unique fruity scent and will transform your lips to a stunning juicy pout.
 
How To Use

Use our ultra comfortable large applicator to swipe product onto lips 

KUTIE TIP:
Wear alone or use as a high-shine top coat paired with our faves Jelly Charm Lip Stain or Love Swipe Lip Mousse
 
Key Ingredients

ALL SHADES: Vitamin Tree Fruit Oil: Nourishes, moisturizes, and helps lips feel soft and supple 

SHADE SPECIFIC:
01. Rose Hip Spritz: Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Oil helps lock in moisture 
02. Raspberry Refresher: Raspberry Seed Oil moisturizes lips
03. Apricot Allure: Apricot Kernel Oil supports the skin's moisture barrier
04. Grape Glowtini: Grape Seed Oil nourishes lips
05. Plum Paloma: Prunus Domestica (Plum) Seed Oil softens lips
06. Fig Smoothie: Fig Extract helps moisturize lips and provides antioxidants
07. Apple Cider: Apple Oil helps moisturize lips
08. Cherry Cola: Black Cherry Extract helps to boost collagen production

description:
Description

MOOD-ENHANCING TINTED LIP BALM: HINCE Mood Enhancer Lip Glow not only adds color to your lips but also enhances your mood with its mood-enhancing formula. The unique blend of ingredients in our lip-plumping lip gloss makes you feel happy, confident, and beautiful every time you wear it.
ENRICHED WITH PURE PLANT EXTRACTS: This roll-on lip gloss contains shea butter, sunflower seed, jojoba seed, and sweet almond to nourish and protect your lips. The natural ingredients provide deep hydration and moisturize your dry, chapped, and dull-looking lips, leaving them soft and healthy-looking.
MOISTURIZE AND PROTECT YOUR LIPS: 70% of this moisturizing lip balm is filled with moisturizing ingredients for lasting moisture. The oil layer prevents the water from escaping for deeply hydrating, keeping them moisturized and protected from the harsh effects of environmental stressors.
ADD A POP OF COLOR TO YOUR SMILE: Whether you prefer a bold and vibrant shade or a subtle and natural hue, this tinted lip balm has a shade for everyone. This lip mask for dry lips comes in multiple colors, including Memories, Dear Rose, Pleasure, Start Over, Impassioned, Let Me Dew, and Chill Out.
NON-STICKY & NON-GREASY FORMULA: This long-lasting lipstick has a non-sticky and non-greasy formula that glides on smoothly and stays put all day. It won't leave your lips feeling heavy or sticky and won't transfer onto your clothes or drinkware. The vegan formula makes it a perfect choice for everyone.

reviews.title: My favorite lip gloss
reviews.content: I tried this on sale, and this is my second purchase now. The consistency is great - not too sticky, but just thick enough to last me through the day if I'm careful with how I eat or drink. The black gloss is my favourite as it adds a nice layer of dark pigment over my lipstick or lip tint. Surprisingly, the small bottle lasts me quite a while, so worth the purchase.

Apply 30% for pure look and 70% for unique mood together with 3D glow.

description:
Description


- The non-sticky formula with soft texture requires no professional techniques
- Glassy radiance for plumper and volume-added lips
- Clear and vivid color so that you can use it as lip gloss, color stays clear and vivid even after multiple layers

#01 Clear: a clear base coat that plumps up the lips for added volume
#02 Edge Nude: goes naturally and seamlessly with your skin tone
#03 Chilling Rosy: red hue in rose color for toned-down and mysterious rosy tint
#04 Good On You: Salmon pink that adds vitality with innocent-looking coral glow 
#05 Way To Go: Cool mauve-glow plum pink reminiscent of high school rom-com queens
#06 Made It: Trendy honey brown with a drop of red
#07 So What
#08 Love Of Fate
#09 Grow On You
How To Use
Take an appropriate amount and apply on the lips. Be sure to close the container cap completely during storage
extra_description: Take an appropriate amount and apply on the lips. Be sure to close the container cap completely during storage

reviews.title: Un gloss genial

description:
Description
Glass lip gloss filled with moisture.
- The gel texture that sticks to your lips without any stickiness
- Use fine color pigments to create vivid colors
- Double volume lip care with 1000 ppm peptide ingredient

*Color
# Tangerine Coral
# Sheer Red
# Nudie Rose


How To Use
Apply it gently from the inside of the lips with the built-in tip.


 Ingredients
Hydrogenated polyisobutene, bis-diglyceryl polyacyl adipate-2, diisostearyl malate, 
octyldodecanol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, polyglyceryl-2 triisostearate , 1,2-hexanediol,
microcrystalline wax, titanium dioxide, ethylhexyl palmitate, red iron oxide, cetearyl alcohol, yellow 4, 
tribehenin, yellow 5, benzyl benzoate, fragrance, sorbitan Isostearate, Red No.202, Black Iron Oxide, Linalool, 
Hexylcinnamal, Vitamin Tree Fruit Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Vanilla Fruit Extract, Drumstick Seed Oil, Glycerin, 
Oleyl Alcohol, Shea Butter, Ceramide NP , Phytosphingosine, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Dol Soybean Oil, 
Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Lape Cdate Fermented Product, Tocopherol, etc.

description:
Description

Glasting Water Gloss is a transparent lip gloss that wraps around your lips and gives them a bright and translucent glow. The sheen it creates can elevate any lip look. Fine glitter particles shimmer as if the sunlight was broken down into a myriad of pieces.

Suggested Use


Apply naturally from the inner to the outer part of your lips.
